00067 bool TWeightedFeatureWrap<BaseObject>::Serialize(iser::IArchive& archive)
00068 {
00069        istd::CChangeNotifier notifier(archive.IsStoring()? NULL: this);
00070 
00071        bool retVal = true;
00072 
00073        retVal = retVal && BaseClass::Serialize(archive);
00074        retVal = retVal && BaseClass2::Serialize(archive);
00075 
00076        iser::CArchiveTag weightTag("Weight", "Weight");
00077        retVal = retVal && archive.BeginTag(weightTag);
00078        retVal = retVal && archive.Process(m_weight);
00079        retVal = retVal && archive.EndTag(weightTag);
00080 
00081        return retVal;
